item.title: About
item.description: This is Marshal. Currently, I am studying for a master's degree at the University of Hong Kong. My idea for blogging came from the Team Rocket, including Pseudoyu and Misty. In the blog, I would record my relevant courses of Electronic Commerce and Internet Computing of HKU, my interesting codes of LeetCode, knowledge and perspective of product manager, my personal thoughts and ideas about the life and friendship and vlogs about personal life in Hong Kong.

item.title: New
item.description: Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency Technologies Lecture 1 Introduction to Crypto and Cryptocurrencies Hash Function Takes any string as input Fixed-size output Efficiently computable Security Properties Collision-free Nobody can find x and y such as “x!=y and H(x)=H(y)" Hiding Given H(x), it’s infeasible to find x Puzzle-friendly For every possible output value y, if k is chosen from a distribution with high min-entropy, then it’s infeasible to find x such as H(k|x)=y SHA-256 Hash Function

item.title: [1] Two Sum
item.description: Question: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. You can return the answer in any order. Example 1: Input: nums = [2,7,11,15], target = 9 Output: [0,1] Output: Because nums[0] + nums[1] == 9, we return [0, 1].

item.title: Vlog 2 Quarantine Diary
item.description: 疫情期间赴港上学隔离14天的生活即将结束，刚刚上完第一节课，视频传传好，我要冲了，努力学习！ 再次感谢小刘同学提供的BGM，期望以后可以持续输出！

item.title: Vlog 1 New Arrival
item.description: 疫情期间赴香港隔离，一路上新奇拍拍拍。要开始读书了，冲！ 特别感谢小刘同学提供的BGM，在这里夸赞一下她的歌品！
